text: Yumi Arima (born 9 September 1997) is a Japanese female water polo player who was ranked 7th in the overall Top Scorers at the 2017 World Championships and 3rd at the 2019 World Championships. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Japanese female water polo players Category:Universiade medalists in water polo Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games medalists in water polo Category:Water polo players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2017 Summer Universiade
title: Yumi Arima
